title: $:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire
name: aim-questionnaire
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/A":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/A","tags":"AIMCategory","letter":"A","caption":"<>"},"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/B":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/B","tags":"AIMCategory","letter":"B","caption":"<>"},"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/C":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/C","tags":"AIMCategory","letter":"C","caption":"<>"},"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/D":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/D","tags":"AIMCategory","letter":"D","caption":"<>"},"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/E":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/E","tags":"AIMCategory","letter":"E","caption":"<>"},"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/F":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/F","tags":"AIMCategory","letter":"F","caption":"<>"},"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/G":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/G","tags":"AIMCategory","letter":"G","caption":"<>"},"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/H":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Categories/H","tags":"AIMCategory","letter":"H","caption":"<>"},"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Language/en-GB":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Language/en-GB","type":"application/x-tiddler-dictionary","text":"BodyDownloadCSV: Click the button to download a .CSV file of the scores which can be opened in Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets BodyDownloadScoresWordDocument: Click the button to download a .DOC file of the scores which can be opened in Microsoft Word or Google Docs ButtonClearAllAnswers: clear ButtonCopyCSVToClipboard: Copy scores data to clipboard ButtonDownloadCSV: Download scores .CSV file BodyDownloadScoresWordDocument: Download scores .DOC file BodyDownloadSuggestionsWordDocument: Download suggestions .DOC file ButtonHideQuestions: hide questions ButtonNext: next ButtonPrevious: previous ButtonShowAllQuestions: show all questions ButtonShowQuestions: show questions CategoryFamily: Family CategoryMeasureOfComplexity: Measure of Complexity CategoryMentalState: Mental State CategoryPowerAndControl: Power and Control CategoryResponseToSituation: Response to Situation CategorySocial: Social CategorySocioEconomic: Socio-Economic CategoryYoungPersonDailyLife: Young Person Daily Life ClearAnswersNo: No, leave existing answers alone ClearAnswersPrompt: Are you sure you wish to clear all existing answers? ClearAnswersYes: Yes, clear all existing answers HeadingDownloadCSV: Download CSV file HeadingDownloadWordDocument: Download results as Word Document LabelKeyProblem: This is a key problem (<> of <>) OverviewSuggestedInterventions: These interventions are suggestions according to the AIM results and are based on available evidence. They are a guide and can be useful as a way of checking that these options have been considered, rather than directing a worker to what they must do. OverviewSuggestionsFocal: Each suggested intervention is ranked in order of how ''severe'' the set of problems are (their averaged AIM scores) that indicate that particular intervention. This is good for ''focusing on the most severe problems'' OverviewSuggestionsGlobal: Each suggested intervention is ranked according to how many different problems (that is AIM items scoring greater than 2) the young person has which that particular intervention is relevant for. This is good for ''covering the whole set of problems and causes'' OverviewSuggestionsLimit: Limit suggested interventions only to those relevant for items identified as ''key problems'' PreviewDownloadCSV: Preview: QuestionFooter: (<> of <> questions completed) ResultsKeyProblems: Key Problems ResultsKeyProblemsNone: (None) ResultsNotAvailableBlocked: The results will be available when all <> questions have been answered â€“ <> have been answered so far ResultsNotAvailableWarning: ''NOTE'': Only <> out of <> questions have been answered; the suggestion interventions below relate only to those <> items ResultsOverview: The results of the assessment are available as numerical scores, and to drive the suggested interventions. [[Guide to scoring AIM data|Scoring AIM data]] ResultsQuestionScores: Question Scores ResultsSubscaleScores: Subscale Scores ResultsTotalScore: Total Score: TabDownload: Download TabQuestionsWizard: Questions TabQuestionsList: List View TabResults: Results TabScores: Scores TabSuggestedInterventions: Suggested Interventions TabSuggestionsFocal: Focal TabSuggestionsGlobal: Global TabSuggestionsLimit: Limit "},"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Macros":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Macros","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define aim-lingo(string) <$transclude tiddler={{{ [{$:/language}get[name]] ~[[en-GB]] +[addprefix[$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Language/]] }}} index=<<__string__>>><$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Language/en-GB" index=<<__string__>>/> \end \define aim-questionnaire()

"},"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Styles":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Styles","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":"\rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline html body.tc-body .tc-tiddler-frame.tc-tagged-AIMQuestion .tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Fedit, html body.tc-body .tc-tiddler-frame.tc-tagged-AIMQuestion .tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Finfo, html body.tc-body .tc-tiddler-frame.tc-tagged-AIMQuestion .tc-btn-\%24\%3A\%2Fcore\%2Fui\%2FButtons\%2Fmore-tiddler-actions, html body.tc-body .tc-tiddler-frame.tc-tagged-AIMQuestion .tc-tag-list-item[data-tag-title="AIMQuestion"], html body.tc-body .tc-tiddler-frame.tc-tagged-AIMQuestion .tc-tag-list-item[data-tag-title="hide-subpage"] { display: none; } .tc-aim-panel .tc-tab-set > .tc-tab-buttons button { font-size: 1.2em; font-weight: bold; padding: 0.5em; } .tc-aim-result-flag { fill: red; } .tc-aim-panel > .tc-tab-set > .tc-tab-content { margin-top: 0; } .tc-aim-panel > .tc-tab-set > .tc-tab-content > .tc-reveal > p { margin: 0; } .tc-aim-panel .tc-aim-popup { text-align: right; } .tc-aim-panel .tc-aim-popup button { color: <>; } .tc-aim-panel .tc-aim-popup button svg { fill: <>; } .tc-aim-panel .tc-aim-indicators { display: flex; width: 100%; background: <>; border-left: 1px solid <>; border-top: 1px solid <>; border-bottom: 1px solid <>; } .tc-aim-panel .tc-aim-indicators .tc-aim-indicator { flex-grow: 1; display: inline-block; border-right: 1px solid <>; min-width: 4px; min-height: 1em; } .tc-aim-panel .tc-aim-status .tc-drop-down button { padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; } .tc-aim-panel .tc-aim-status .tc-drop-down button.tc-aim-question-key-problem { font-weight: bold; } .tc-aim-panel .tc-aim-status .tc-drop-down button .tc-aim-question-key-problem-indicator { float: right; padding-left: 0.5em; } .tc-aim-panel .tc-aim-status .tc-drop-down button .tc-aim-question-key-problem-indicator svg { fill: red; } .tc-aim-panel .tc-aim-status .tc-dropdown-item-plain { color: #969696; } .tc-aim-panel .tc-aim-questions { border-left: 1px solid <>; border-right: 1px solid <>; border-bottom: 1px solid <>; line-height: 1.4; padding: 1em; } .tc-aim-navigation-buttons { text-align: center; } button.tc-aim-navigation-button { width: auto; cursor: pointer; border: none; background: <>; padding: 5px; margin: 0 0.5em; color: <>; fill: <>; border-radius: 0.25em; } button.tc-aim-navigation-button-clear { background: #e46666; } button.tc-aim-navigation-button-previous { background: #6666e4; } button.tc-aim-navigation-button-next { background: #2bad2b; } button.tc-aim-navigation-button-next:disabled { color: <>; background: <>; } button.tc-aim-navigation-button-next:disabled svg { fill: <>; } button.tc-aim-navigation-button-results { background: #ffaf16; } button.tc-aim-navigation-button:hover { background-color: <>; } .tc-aim-navigation-footer { text-align: center; margin-top: 1em; color: #9e9e9e; } .tc-aim-navigation-button-drop-down { text-align: left; } .tc-aim-question h3 { float: left; font-size: 4em; line-height: 1; padding: 0.25em; margin: 0 0.25em 0.25em 0; border-radius: 0.125em; <> border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3); } .tc-aim-question h2 { font-size: 1.5em; line-height: 1.1; margin: 0; } .tc-aim-question h1 { font-size: 2em; line-height: 1.1; font-weight: bold; margin: 0; } .tc-aim-question p { clear: both; font-size: 1.5em; } .tc-aim-question .tc-aim-answer { margin: 0.5em 0; border-radius: 1em; } .tc-aim-question .tc-aim-answer:hover { background: #ffffff; } .tc-aim-question .tc-aim-answer label { display: block; padding: 0.25em; } .tc-aim-question .tc-aim-answer-selected { background-color: #ffff77; } .tc-aim-question .tc-aim-key-answer-selected { background: #ffc9c9; } .tc-aim-question-done { } .tc-aim-navigation-edit-mode { margin-top: 1em; border: 1px solid <>; background-color: #e0bfbb20; } .tc-aim-navigation-edit-mode-heading { background-color: #333; color: #fff; font-weight: bold; text-transform: uppercase; } .tc-aim-navigation-edit-mode-body { padding: 0 1em; } .tc-aim-navigation-edit-mode-item { margin: 1em 0; } .tc-aim-navigation-edit-mode-item textarea { width: 100%; } .tc-aim-questions-list-category { font-weight: bold; color: #969696; font-size: 1.4em; line-height: 1.8em; } .tc-aim-questions-list-heading { color: #969696; } .tc-aim-questions-list-question { } .tc-aim-results-interventions { list-style: none; padding-left: 0; } .tc-aim-results-interventions .tc-aim-results-intervention { font-size: 1.5em; line-height: 1.5; } .tc-aim-results-interventions .tc-aim-results-intervention .tc-aim-results-score { display: inline-block; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; background-color: #2eb547; color: <>; padding: 0.25em; border-radius: 3em; margin: 0.25em; width: 2em; height: 2em; } .tc-aim-results-interventions .tc-aim-results-intervention .tc-aim-results-score .tc-aim-results-score-small { font-size: 0.8em; padding: 0; vertical-align: middle; } .tc-aim-results-interventions .tc-aim-results-intervention button { font-size: 0.5em; line-height: 1; display: inline-block; padding: 4px; margin: 2px 4px 2px 4px; background: <>; color: <>; fill: <>; border: none; border-radius: 2px; text-decoration: none; } .tc-aim-results-interventions > li { line-height: 1.5; } .tc-aim-results-intervention-questions { list-style: none; padding-left: 1em; } .tc-aim-results-intervention-questions > li { line-height: 1.5; } .tc-aim-download-results { width: 100%; overflow-x: scroll; white-space: nowrap; } .tc-aim-category-A {background-color: #bfbbe0;} .tc-aim-category-A.tc-aim-category-faded {background-color: #bfbbe020;} .tc-aim-category-B {background-color: #d4bac3;} .tc-aim-category-B.tc-aim-category-faded {background-color: #d4bac320;} .tc-aim-category-C {background-color: #ebc6b1;} .tc-aim-category-C.tc-aim-category-faded {background-color: #ebc6b120;} .tc-aim-category-D {background-color: #fad9ae;} .tc-aim-category-D.tc-aim-category-faded {background-color: #fad9ae20;} .tc-aim-category-E {background-color: #fee99a;} .tc-aim-category-E.tc-aim-category-faded {background-color: #fee99a20;} .tc-aim-category-F {background-color: #fff172;} .tc-aim-category-F.tc-aim-category-faded {background-color: #fff17220;} .tc-aim-category-G {background-color: #ffcd42;} .tc-aim-category-G.tc-aim-category-faded {background-color: #ffcd4220;} .tc-aim-category-H {background-color: #f79577;} .tc-aim-category-H.tc-aim-category-faded {background-color: #f7957720;} .tc-aim-ui-editor-list { } .tc-aim-ui-editor-list-item { background-color: #e8e8e8; margin-bottom: 1em; } .tc-aim-ui-editor-list textarea { width: 100%; } .tc-aim-ui-editor-list-heading { background: #333; color: #fff; } .tc-aim-ui-editor-list-body { padding: 0 1em; } .tc-aim-ui-editor-list-body-item { } "},"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/CSVDownloadTemplate":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/CSVDownloadTemplate","text":"\whitespace trim <$vars sortby="[get[number]]" linebreak=" "> <$text text=<>/> <> <$text text=<>/> <$list filter="[tag{$:/config/federatial/aim-questionnaire/aim-question-tag}sortsub:number]" counter="counter"> <$text text={{{ [{$:/status/UserName}else[anon]addprefix[$:/temp/AIM/Answer/]addsuffix[/]addsuffixget[text]] ~[[missing]] }}}/> <$list filter="[!match[yes]]"> <$text text=<>/> <$text text=<>/> "},"$:/config/federatial/aim-questionnaire/aim-category-tag":{"title":"$:/config/federatial/aim-questionnaire/aim-category-tag","text":"AIMCategory"},"$:/config/federatial/aim-questionnaire/aim-question-tag":{"title":"$:/config/federatial/aim-questionnaire/aim-question-tag","text":"AIMQuestion"},"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/config","text":"Tag used to identify AIM Questions: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/federatial/aim-questionnaire/aim-question-tag" tag="input"/> Tag used to identify AIM Categories: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/federatial/aim-questionnaire/aim-category-tag" tag="input"/> --- <$list filter="[{$:/state/aim-questionnaire/edit-mode}!match[show]]" variable="ignore"> <$button class="tc-btn-big-green"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/aim-questionnaire/edit-mode" $value="show"/> Switch on edit mode <$list filter="[{$:/state/aim-questionnaire/edit-mode}match[show]]" variable="ignore"> <$button class="tc-btn-big-green" style="background-color: red;"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/aim-questionnaire/edit-mode" $value="hide"/> Switch off edit mode --- Edit user interface strings:
<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Language/en-GB]indexes[]sort[]]" variable="index">
''<$text text=<>/>''
//<$text text={{{ [[$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Language/en-GB]getindex] }}}/>//
<$edit-text tiddler={{{ [{$:/language}get[name]] ~[[en-GB]] +[addprefix[$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Language/]] }}} index=<> autoHeight="yes" minHeight="1em"/>
"},"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/debug":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/debug","text":"\define answers() =0plus =0 =1 =2 =3 =4 =0plus =0 =1 =2 =3 =4 =0plus =0 =1 =2 =3 =4 =0plus =0 =1 =2 =3 =4 =0plus =0 =1 =2 =3 =4 =0plus =0 =1 =2 =3 =4 =0plus =0 =1 =2 =3 =4 =0plus For testing purposes, this button answers all questions with a random answer. <$button> <$list filter="[tag{$:/config/federatial/aim-questionnaire/aim-question-tag}]" counter="counter"> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{{ [{$:/status/UserName}addprefix[$:/temp/AIM/Answer/]addsuffix[/]addsuffix] }}} $value={{{ [subfilternth] }}}/> <$list filter="1 3 7 12 32 42"> <$list filter="[tag{$:/config/federatial/aim-questionnaire/aim-question-tag}field:number]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{{ [{$:/status/UserName}addprefix[$:/temp/AIM/KeyAnswer/]addsuffix[/]addsuffix] }}} $value="yes"/> Answer all questions "},"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/readme","text":"! Introduction ! Usage Use the following macro to display the questionnaire and results: ``` <> ``` ! Translating the AIM Questionnaire To translate the questionnaire into a different language: # Install the TiddlyWiki language plugin for the desired language, and note the language code (eg, Castellano Spanish is `es-ES`) # Clone the tiddler $:/plugins/federatial/aim-questionnaire/Language/en-GB # Replace the `en-GB` in the title with the language code (eg `es-ES`) # Edit the definitions in the tiddler to match the language #* Take care to keep the macro calls intact (eg `<>`) # Choose the tag used to identify question tiddlers and enter it in the "config" tab of this plugin # Translate the English questions and answers into the target language #* Translate the titles of the tiddlers to the target language #* Add tags corresponding to the interventions suggested by each question # Use the "language" button in the sidebar "Tools" tab to switch to the target language to test the translation "}}}
